items.sentence: Don\'t you understand why this is a problem?
Most houses around here don\'t have cellars.
Tom and Mary are in the next room with John.
Why aren\'t you doing what I told you to do?
I didn\'t want to go and Tom didn\'t either.
I\'ve already decided what I\'m going to do.
Tom had no money and couldn\'t buy any food.
Tom\'s face lights up whenever he sees Mary.
Tom\'s funeral will be held on October 20th.
I took three years of French in high school.
There\'s no question that Tom\'s got talent.
Have you gone to any good concerts recently?
Can\'t you understand that it\'s impossible?
Tom did some work for Mary a few years back.
I wish I could remember where I put my keys.
I wish I could show you how much I love you.
Tom can\'t remember when he moved to Boston.
There\'s nothing on TV that I want to watch.
Tom is going through a rough time right now.
Tom wanted some money to buy some ice cream.
